src_original: dvātriṃśadbhi kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo ityucyate /
tgt_original: yathoktaṁ : - “dvātriṁśadbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo bodhisattva ity ucyate |

src_original: sarvajñajñānāvatāraṇatayā kim ahammargāmīti pareṣāṃ jñānākunsanatā niradhimānatayā /
tgt_original: (2) sarvajñajñānāvatāraṇatayā |  (3) kim aham arghāmīti pareṣāṁ jñānākunsanatā |  (4) niradhimāntayā |

src_original: KP.24 anṛtavākyatā smitamukhapūrvābhibhāṣaṇatā nupādatteṣu bhāreṣv . v. ṣ. d.
n........... sarvasattveṣvaparicinnamahākaruṇatā aparikhinnamānasatayā saddharmaparyeṣṭim ārabhyātṛ....... śrutārthatayā /
tgt_original: (10) sarvasattveṣv aparicchinnamahākaruṇatā |  (11) upādatteṣu bhāreṣv aviṣādanatayā |  (12) aparikhinnamāna- satayā |  (13) saddharmaparyeṣtim ārabhyātṛptaśrutārthata- yā |
